title: Effective Mathematics Instructional Design Workshop in E-Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Mathematics knowledge aligned with primary and secondary education curricula and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented course to enhance math e-learning design competencies for pre-service and elementary school teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain two or more design strategies for interactive math content that promotes engagement in e-learning environments.
Learners can perform procedures to analyze learner needs using survey and interview techniques.
Learners can develop lesson plans incorporating effective multimedia materials (videos, simulations, etc.) for explaining mathematical concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
